welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lake St. Louis! This charming city is known for its beautiful lake and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that it has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Spirit of St Louis Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Spirit of St Louis Airport is exclusively for private flights and charter services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves as the hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: East Terminal
terminals.description: The East Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport is primarily used for regional flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: West Terminal
terminals.description: The West Terminal at Lambert-St. Louis International Airport serves as a secondary terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
